T02D1897:259b-1: snga sa na sarba ka s'a dha na n'a ma /

T02D1897:267b-17: kyi dngos po rnams mngon par sprul pa yid kyis

T02D1897:269b-29: tsitta pra ti be dha nam ka ro mi zhes
T02D1897:269b-30: bya ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te /
T02D1897:269b-31: shes rab chen po'i rang bzhin du lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D1897:269b-32: de nas de'i steng du mthar gnas pa'i wa yig
T02D1897:269b-33: dang ksha yig spangs pa'i ka la sogs pa gsal
T02D1897:269b-34: byed sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams lugs dang mthun pa
T02D1897:269b-35: dang / yang de nyid lugs dang mi mthun bdag
T02D1897:269b-36: gis phreng ba'i dbus su yang aa yig la sogs
T02D1897:269b-37: pa'i dbyangs yig bcu drug lugs dang mthun pa'o //
T02D1897:269b-38: gsal byed de rnams dang dbyangs yig rnams dkar po
T02D1897:269b-39: mgo gyen du 'greng pa rnams kyis sngon bzhin du
T02D1897:269b-40: bkug la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams rnam
T02D1897:269b-41: par bsgoms te / de yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1897:270a-0: de'i steng du nam mkha' la sor drug @270a *
T02D1897:270a-1: par bsgoms te / // gcig gis 'phags par ni
T02D1897:270a-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa rnam par bsgoms la
T02D1897:270a-3: par bsgoms te / // / aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba'i sngags te /
T02D1897:270a-4: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin du lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D1897:270a-5: de nas zla ba gnyis phan tshun gzugs brnyan gsal
T02D1897:270a-6: bar snang ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes
T02D1897:270a-7: so // de gnyis gcig tu gyur pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1897:270a-8: de'i steng du h'um yig rnams dkar po yongs su
T02D1897:270a-9: gyur pa las rdo rje dmar po rtse lnga pa'i
T02D1897:270a-10: lte ba'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'um
T02D1897:270a-12: de'i brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D1897:270a-13: rjod par byed pa stong pa nyid du so sor
T02D1897:270a-14: rtog pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so
T02D1897:270a-15: // de las spros pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i tshogs
T02D1897:270a-16: rnams kyis 'gro ba thams cad rdo rje 'dzin par
T02D1897:270a-17: byas nas slar de nyid du rab tu zhugs la
T02D1897:270a-18: // / aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya bar
T02D1897:270a-19: nga rgyal byed pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi
T02D1897:270a-20: // / ye shes so // de nas zla ba
T02D1897:270a-21: dang rdo rje dang h'um yig rnams yongs su gyur
T02D1897:270a-22: pa las rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs pa
T02D1897:270a-23: ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D1897:270a-25: de ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs
T02D1897:270a-26: pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid sku mdog dkar po
T02D1897:270a-27: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa bcom
T02D1897:270a-28: ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid bsgom par
T02D1897:270a-29: bya'o // de nas 'dod chags chen po'i gdul byar
T02D1897:270a-30: khams gsum pa lhag par mos par byas la rang
T02D1897:270a-31: gi rig ma dang lhan cig tu shin tu dga'
T02D1897:270a-32: ba rtsom pa dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgras de bzhin
T02D1897:270a-33: gshegs pa rnams bkug la rang gi lus kyi ba
T02D1897:270a-34: spu'i bu ga'i nang du zhugs te /
T02D1897:270a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang sku gcig tu gyur
T02D1897:270a-36: pas bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang ldan pa rang
T02D1897:270a-37: gi rig ma legs pa dang bla na med pa'i
T02D1897:270a-38: bde ba'i mchog rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1897:270a-39: de bzhin du rang gi lus las rnam par spros
T02D1897:270a-40: pa rnams spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo dgu'i
T02D1897:270a-41: rigs su gyur pa dpag tu med pa rnams bcom
T02D1897:270a-42: ldan 'das ma la ji srid thim par bsgoms la
T02D1897:270a-43: mtha' dag lha mo'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du gyur
T02D1897:270b-0: pas bcom ldan 'das ma 'dod @270b pa dang ldan
T02D1897:270b-1: pa'i bdag nyid kyang bde ba shin tu gsal bar
T02D1897:270b-3: / de nas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i phyag
T02D1897:270b-4: mtshan gyi sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs
T02D1897:270b-5: bcur khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug
T02D1897:270b-7: thugs ka'i phyag mtshan gyi sa bon gyi 'od zer
T02D1897:270b-8: gyis reg pas bde ba chen po'i dbang du gyur
T02D1897:270b-9: pas zhu nas rdo rje'i lam nas byung ste lha
T02D1897:270b-10: mo'i padma'i nang du babs par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1897:270b-11: de nas rdo rje dang padma bskyod pa las 'od
T02D1897:270b-12: kyi gong bu de yongs su gyur pa las gtso
T02D1897:270b-13: bo mi bskyod pa'i rten dang brten pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1897:270b-14: dpal dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yid kyis bsams nas
T02D1897:270b-15: / der sems can thams cad gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1897:270b-16: de nas gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil
T02D1897:270b-17: 'khor gyi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin du bkug ste
T02D1897:270b-18: / rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas man ngag ji
T02D1897:270b-19: lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la reg
T02D1897:270b-20: pas ji ltar lhag par mos pas ji lta ba
T02D1897:270b-21: bzhin du sku gsum gyi bdag nyid sa'i snying po
T02D1897:270b-22: la sogs pa'i gzugs su bskyed pa rnams 'og nas
T02D1897:270b-23: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyis dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1897:270b-24: ksham dzrim kham gamshkam sam zhes bya bas sa'i snying po dang phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D1897:270b-27: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1897:270b-28: kun du bzang po rnams so //
T02D1897:270b-30: kham ram zhes bya ba nas gzugs rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1897:270b-34: reg bya rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1897:270b-35: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1897:270b-36: l'am m'am p'am t'am zhes byas bas spyan ma dang /
T02D1897:270b-40: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um zhes bya ba 'dis rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1897:270b-44: mi bskyod pa rnams spros pa dang /
T02D1897:270b-45: de kho na nyid gsum gyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa spros pa'o //
T02D1897:270b-46: 'di nyid kyis gzhal yas khang ji srid du phyi
T02D1897:270b-47: rol gyi gzhal yas khang la thim par bsgom par
T02D1897:270b-48: bya'o // de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su gang nas
T02D1897:270b-49: byon cing tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag
T02D1897:270b-50: nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dod chags chen po'i ros
T02D1897:271a-1: zhal du zhugs nas zhu bar gyur pa rdo rje'i
T02D1897:271a-2: lam na padmar bcas par bltas la 'od kyi gong
T02D1897:271a-3: bu de yongs su gyur pa las ho yig dmar
T02D1897:271a-4: po gnyis kyi bar du de kho na nyid gsum
T02D1897:271a-5: blta bar bya'o // de nas yi ge de rnams
T02D1897:271a-6: thabs dang shes rab kyi 'dod chags chen po me
T02D1897:271a-8: shes rab gnyis kyang gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'od dpag tu med par gsal te /
T02D1897:271a-9: 'dod chags chen po 'bar ba 'ja' tshon lta bur zhu ba'o //
T02D1897:271a-10: de nas de'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i thog ma
T02D1897:271a-11: med pa nas grub pa'i 'jam dpa'i rdo rje las
T02D1897:271a-13: m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma
T02D1897:271a-14: dang gnas ji lta ba na gnas pas rang rang
T02D1897:271a-15: gi tshigs su bcad pas 'od kyi gong bu de
T02D1897:271a-16: la bskul bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1897:271a-17: sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje thugs //
T02D1897:271a-18: dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la skyabs su gsol //
T02D1897:271a-19: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1897:271a-20: 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1897:271a-21: rdo rje sku khyod ni rdo rje thugs /
T02D1897:271a-22: dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la skyabs su gsol //
T02D1897:271a-23: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1897:271a-24: sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1897:271a-25: khyod ni rdo rje bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan //
T02D1897:271a-26: sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rab tu phan par gzigs //
T02D1897:271a-27: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1897:271a-28: 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1897:271a-29: khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba //
T02D1897:271a-30: 'jig rten dag gi don dang dgongs pa mdzad la rab tu brtson //
T02D1897:271a-31: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1897:271a-32: rab dga'i spyod pa kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D1897:271a-33: khyod ni rdo rje'i 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che //
T02D1897:271b-0: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid thugs @271b brtse ba //
T02D1897:271b-1: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzheng na //
T02D1897:271b-2: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mngod [*mdzod?] //
T02D1897:271b-3: de nas bskul ba'i sgras rab tu sangs te chos
T02D1897:271b-4: thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar rnam par
T02D1897:271b-5: bsgoms la 'od kyi gong bu de las 'od zer
T02D1897:271b-6: spros pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje rnams rnam par spros
T02D1897:271b-7: pas 'gro ba'i don byas nas spyan ma la sogs
T02D1897:271b-8: pa'i lha mo bzhis bkug nas 'od kyi gong bu
T02D1897:271b-9: de la rab tu zhugs par blta'o //
T02D1897:271b-10: de nas 'od kyi gong bu de yongs su gyur
T02D1897:271b-11: pa las mam yig bltas nas de nas yang 'jam
T02D1897:271b-12: pa'i rdo rje rnams rnam par spros pas 'gro ba'i
T02D1897:271b-13: don byed pa sngon du 'gro bas mam yig yongs
T02D1897:271b-14: su gyur pa las ral gri'i yu ba las zla
T02D1897:271b-15: ba'i gnas su mam yig gis byin gyis brlabs la
T02D1897:271b-16: yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje rnams rnam par spros pas
T02D1897:271b-17: 'gro ba'i don byas na mam yig dang ral gri
T02D1897:271b-18: yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i
T02D1897:271b-19: rdo rje gur gum lta bu'i snying rje chen po
T02D1897:271b-20: dang shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /
T02D1897:271b-21: ji srid nam mkha'i khams 'od kyis khyab pa /
T02D1897:271b-22: rigs dpag tu med pa spros pas 'gro ba'i don byed par rtsom pa ral gri nag po dang /
T02D1897:271b-25: gzhu dmar po 'dzin pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1897:271b-26: de nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D1897:271b-27: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das te
T02D1897:271b-28: / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid mi phyed pa gzung ba dang /
T02D1897:271b-29: 'dzin pa stong pa nyid kyi chos kyi sku de
T02D1897:271b-30: bzhin gshegs pa dang chos thams cad lhan cig dbyer
T02D1897:271b-31: mi phyed par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dir lhag
T02D1897:271b-33: aom dharmma dh'a tu sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham
T02D1897:271b-34: zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yongs su
T02D1897:271b-35: rdzogs pa ni chung ngu'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu
T02D1897:271b-38: // / de nas mig 'bras kyi steng gnyis su so
T02D1897:271b-39: sor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ksham yig dkar po
T02D1897:271b-40: de yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo dkar po
T02D1897:271b-41: rtsibs brgyad pa'o // de'i lte ba'i nang du zla
T02D1897:271b-42: ba la gnas pa'i ksham yig de las sa'i snying
T02D1897:272a-1: 'gro ba'i don byed pa sngon du 'gro bas ksham
T02D1897:272a-2: yig dang 'khor lo yongs su gyur ba las mig
T02D1897:272a-3: gi dbang po rnam par dag pa rnam par snang
T02D1897:272a-4: mdzad bzhin du sa'i snying po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1897:272a-5: de ltar rna ba gnyis la so sor zla ba
T02D1897:272a-6: las rdzim yig nag po dang rdo rje yongs su
T02D1897:272a-7: gyur ba las mi bskyod pa bzhin du phyag na
T02D1897:272a-8: rdo rje'o // sna'i rtsa bar zla ba la kham
T02D1897:272a-9: yig ser po dang rin chen 'byung ldan bzhin du
T02D1897:272a-11: lce'i dbus su zla ba la gam yig dmar po
T02D1897:272a-12: dang padma yongs su gyur ba las 'od dpag med
T02D1897:272a-13: de de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02D1897:272a-14: dpral ba'i dbus su zla ba la shkam yig ljang
T02D1897:272a-15: gu dang ral gri nag po yongs su gyur ba
T02D1897:272a-16: las don yod grub pa bzhin du sgrib pa rnam
T02D1897:272a-17: par sel ba'o // mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i 'og tu
T02D1897:272a-18: zla ba la sam yig dkar po dang rdo rje
T02D1897:272a-19: dmar po yongs su gyur ba las rdo rje sems
T02D1897:272a-20: dpa' bzhin du kun du bzang po bsgom par bya'o
T02D1897:272a-21: par sel ba'o // // 'di ni dbang po rnam par sbyong ba'o /
T02D1897:272a-23: // / de bzhin du nam mkha' la zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1897:272a-24: 'khor la gnas pa'i dzam dkar po dang me long
T02D1897:272a-25: yongs su gyur ba las gzugs rnam par dag pa
T02D1897:272a-26: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin gzugs rdo rje
T02D1897:272a-28: h'um yig nag po dang pi wang yongs su gyur
T02D1897:272a-29: ba las sgra rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa'i
T02D1897:272a-30: rang bzhin sgra rdo rje ma pi wang 'dzin pa'o
T02D1897:272a-31: / bam yig ser po dang dri chus bkang ba'i
T02D1897:272a-32: dung phor yongs su gyur ba las dri rnam par
T02D1897:272a-33: dag pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin dri
T02D1897:272a-34: rdo rje ma dri chus bkang ba'i dung phor 'dzin
T02D1897:272a-35: / pa'o // ho yig dmar po dang ro'i snod
T02D1897:272a-36: yongs su gyur ba las ro rnam par dag pa
T02D1897:272a-37: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin rdo rje ma
T02D1897:272a-38: ros bkang ba'i snod dkar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1897:272a-39: kham yig ljang gu dang gos sna tshogs yongs su
T02D1897:272a-40: gyur ba las reg bya rnam par dag pa don
T02D1897:272a-41: yod grub pa'i rang bzhin reg bya rdo rje ma
T02D1897:272a-43: ram yig dkar po dang chos 'byung yongs su gyur
T02D1897:272a-44: ba las chos khams rnam par dag pa rdo rje
T02D1897:272a-45: sems dpa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje
T02D1897:272a-46: ma chos 'byung 'dzin pa ste 'di ni yul drug
T02D1897:272b-0: // / @272b de bzhin du yam yig dkar po dang 'khor
T02D1897:272b-1: lo rtsibs brgyad pa yongs su gyur ba las sa'i
T02D1897:272b-2: khams rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin spyan ma 'khor
T02D1897:272b-4: mam yig nag po dang autpala dmar po yongs su
T02D1897:272b-5: gyur ba las chu'i khams rnam par dag pa mi
T02D1897:272b-6: bskyod pa'i rang bzhin m'a ma k'i autpala dmar po
T02D1897:272b-7: 'dzin pa'o // a'am yig ser po dang /
T02D1897:272b-8: rin po che yongs su gyur ba las me'i khams
T02D1897:272b-9: rnam par dag pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang
T02D1897:272b-10: bzhin gos dkar mo padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1897:272b-11: pa 'dzin pa'o // tam yig ser po dang gser
T02D1897:272b-12: gyi autpala yongs su gyur ba las rlung gi khams
T02D1897:272b-13: rnam par dag pa rin chen chos 'byung ldan gyi
T02D1897:272b-14: rang bzhin sgrol ma gser gyi autpala 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1897:272b-15: 'di ni khams bzhi rnam par sbyong ba'o /
T02D1897:272b-17: // / de bzhin du bhrum yig dkar po dang 'khor
T02D1897:272b-18: lo yongs su gyur ba las gzugs kyi phung po
T02D1897:272b-19: rnam par dag pa rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo
T02D1897:272b-20: dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1897:272b-22: rin po che yongs su gyur ba las tshor ba'i
T02D1897:272b-23: phung po rnam par dag pa rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D1897:272b-24: rin po che ljang gu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1897:272b-25: dzrim yig dmar po dang padma yongs su gyur ba
T02D1897:272b-26: las 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa
T02D1897:272b-27: 'od dpag tu med pa padma dmar po 'dab ma
T02D1897:272b-29: kham yig ljang gu dang ral gri yongs su gyur
T02D1897:272b-30: ba las 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag
T02D1897:272b-31: pa don yod grub pa ral gri nag po 'dzin
T02D1897:272b-32: pa'o // h'um yig nag po dang rdo rje yongs
T02D1897:272b-33: su gyur ba las rnam par shes pa'i phung po
T02D1897:272b-34: rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa rdo rje nag
T02D1897:272b-35: pa'o // po 'dzin pa'o // 'di ni phung po lnga rnam par sbyor ba'o //
T02D1897:272b-36: chung ngu'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T02D1897:272b-37: chung ngu'i nye bar sgrub pa'o /
T02D1897:272b-39: // / nu ma gnyis kyi 'og tu zla ba la
T02D1897:272b-40: gnas pa'i h'um yig nag po de yongs su gyur
T02D1897:272b-41: ba las rdo rje nag po de'i dbus kyi lte
T02D1897:272b-42: ba la gnas pa'i h'um yig nag po'o //
T02D1897:272b-43: de yongs su gyur ba las slar yang rdo rje'i
T02D1897:272b-44: lte ba'i dbus su zla ba la gnas pa'i h'um
T02D1897:272b-45: yig ste / de las thugs rdo rje spro ba
T02D1897:272b-46: dang bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba'i nang du gnas
T02D1897:272b-47: pa'i h'um yig dang rdo rje yongs su gyur ba
T02D1897:273a-0: las phyag na rdo rje yongs su gyur @273a *
T02D1897:273a-1: yig ste / // pa las phyag na rdo rje lta bu'i thugs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1897:273a-2: de nas thugs rdo rje'i snying gar zla ba la
T02D1897:273a-3: gnas pa'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su zla ba
T02D1897:273a-4: la gnas pa'i h'um yig las byung ba'i thugs rdo

T02D1897:279b-7: pa rab tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid sems can thams
T02D1897:279b-8: cad kyi gzugs kyi gzung ba dang /
T02D1897:279b-9: 'dzin pa la sogs par btags pa'i spros pa rnam par grol ba'o //
T02D1897:279b-10: yul dang dngos po thams cad la khyab pa dmigs
T02D1897:279b-11: pa na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan skye
T02D1897:279b-12: ba'i rgyu ste mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzhin
T02D1897:279b-13: du brtags pa thun mong gi chos so //
T02D1897:279b-14: de nyid kyang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rten du nges te /
T02D1897:279b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku ru shes so //
T02D1897:279b-16: bsgrub bya ni sangs rgyas nyid de /
T02D1897:279b-17: 'di ltar yang gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng na sdug
T02D1897:279b-18: po bkod pa'i ming can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1897:279b-20: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i rang bzhin stobs
T02D1897:279b-21: dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen
T02D1897:279b-22: pa la sogs pa yid kyi yon tan gyis rgyas
T02D1897:279b-23: par gyur pa mtshan dang dpe byad kyis 'bar bar
T02D1897:279b-24: gyur pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid de brtags
T02D1897:279b-25: pas stong pa'i mtshan nyid chos kyi sku mngon du
T02D1897:279b-26: byas te / sprul pa spros pas mtshams med par
T02D1897:279b-27: 'gro ba'i don yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa
T02D1897:279b-28: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1897:279b-29: sa dgu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpas kyang mi mthong ba'i sku /
T02D1897:279b-30: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog gis
T02D1897:279b-31: chos nyan pa'i sgo nas 'khor ba ji srid kyi
T02D1897:279b-32: bar du bzhugs pa ste de nyid bsgrub bya'o //
T02D1897:279b-33: sgrub thabs ni slar yang lcags kyi khang pa 'bar
T02D1897:279b-34: bar rab tu zhugs par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gsum
T02D1897:279b-35: gyis sdug bsngal ba'i khams gsum pa nges pa la
T02D1897:279b-36: sogs pas tshig don lnga po nges pa la thug
T02D1897:279b-37: pas yon tan bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i byang chub
T02D1897:279b-38: sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la goms
T02D1897:279b-39: pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis gnas
T02D1897:280a-0: pa'o // dpal ldan sngags kyi theg pa'i tshul la @280a * //
T02D1897:280a-3: de kho na nyid ni de rnams nyid do //
T02D1897:280a-4: bsgrub bya dang sgrub thabs dag la khyad par yod de /
T02D1897:280a-5: de la bsgrub bya ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid /
T02D1897:280a-6: 'on kyang 'dir bye brag ni rlung dang me dang
T02D1897:280a-7: sa dang chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yangs pa
T02D1897:280a-8: na rdo rje sa gzhi la sogs pa'i dbus na
T02D1897:280a-9: gnas pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte bar dpal ldan
T02D1897:280a-10: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang na gnas pa'i gzhal
T02D1897:280a-11: yas khang du ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i
T02D1897:280a-12: dbang phyug yid du 'ong ba'i gnas phun sum tshogs
T02D1897:280a-13: pa na sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan gyis dag
T02D1897:280a-14: pa'i rten dang brten pa'i rang bzhin dag yod pa
T02D1897:280a-15: na bsgrub byar 'dod pa'i rgyal ba lha mo'i 'dod
T02D1897:280a-16: pas dam par 'khyud pa'i bya bar gnas shing chags
T02D1897:280a-17: pa'o // de nas gzhan du yang 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1897:280a-18: mchog tu rnam par g-yeng ba'i dga' ba 'jigs pa
T02D1897:280a-19: dang chags pa'i skal ba lta bu der dge la
T02D1897:280a-20: rtog pa med cing thabs kyi blo dang ting nge
T02D1897:280a-21: 'dzin las byung ba de bas rab tu gang ba
T02D1897:280a-22: / bde ba chen po gang skyes pa //
T02D1897:280a-23: 'dod pa yon tan lnga rnam pa //
T02D1897:280a-24: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gsal ba ni //
T02D1897:280a-25: nyin mtshan rgyun du mi 'chad pa'o //
T02D1897:280a-26: de yi ye shes rtogs rang bzhin //
T02D1897:280a-27: gsal ba yin pas rtogs pa med //
T02D1897:280a-28: sna tshogs gnyis su med rang bzhin //
T02D1897:280a-29: yod med rtogs pas rjod byed phyir //
T02D1897:280a-30: thugs rjes spro ba dang bsdu ba //
T02D1897:280a-31: sngar goms pa yi dbang gis yin //
T02D1897:280a-32: lhun grub sems can don yin te ;
T02D1897:280a-33: / de nas yid bzhin nor bu bzhin //
T02D1897:280a-34: de ni lhun gyis grub pas na //
T02D1897:280a-35: rtag tu ma nyams pa yi blo //
T02D1897:280a-36: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs 'gro ba yi //
T02D1897:280a-37: don byed pa la rab tu 'jug / de bas
T02D1897:280a-38: 'di ltar sku dang ldan pa shes rab la 'khyud
T02D1897:280a-39: pa rang gsal rang bzhin te /
T02D1897:280a-40: mchog tu thugs rjes rab tu rgyun chud pa dang rnam par bral ba'i sku //
T02D1897:280a-41: dpe med pa yi bde gang rten dang brten pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T02D1897:280a-42: thub pa'i dbang po'i yan lag bdun dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1897:280a-43: 'di ldan yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i bzhi pa ni bsgrub bya'o //
T02D1897:280b-0: 'di nyid ni @280b phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu brjod do //
T02D1897:280b-1: kha cig slar yang 'di lta bu bsgrub bya yin par smra ste /
T02D1897:280b-2: shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang gi dus na
T02D1897:280b-3: bla ma'i man ngag gis so sor bdag nyid rig
T02D1897:280b-4: cing / mchog dga' dang dga' bral gyi dus su
T02D1897:280b-5: gnas pa chos thams cad kyi gcig tu lhan cig
T02D1897:280b-6: skyes pa phyag dang zhal dang kha dog dang /

T02D1897:280b-8: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa mtha' yas pa'i de bzhin
T02D1897:280b-9: gshegs pa'i yon tan rin po che rdzogs pa'i bdag
T02D1897:280b-10: nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed pa kun

T02D1897:280b-17: byed pa / ba / gsal ba zag pa med pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin tsam /
T02D1897:280b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid blang bar bya'o //
T02D1897:280b-19: 'di yang rtag tu shar ba'i phyir ma rig pa tsam rnam par log pas thob par bya'o //
T02D1897:280b-20: med pa nyid yin na yang bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rdzogs par bya ba'o //
T02D1897:280b-21: 'di ni nges par gdams ngag ngan pa yin pa'i phyir thag ring du spang bar bya'o //
T02D1897:280b-22: 'di ltar yang bde ba chen po gcig pu mngon
T02D1897:280b-23: par 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya yin pa nyid du ci
T02D1897:280b-25: dgag par bya ba ma yin pas sam /

T02D1897:280b-27: de gcig pu 'dod pa srid pas sam /
T02D1897:280b-28: shes rab ye shes kyi dus na de tsam rab tu snang bas sam /
T02D1897:280b-29: man ngag brgyud pa las 'ongs pa yin zhes brtag pa bdun no //
T02D1897:280b-30: khyed kyi bde ba tsam la gcig tu lung sgrub
T02D1897:280b-31: par byed pa ma yin la slar yang gnod par
T02D1897:280b-33: brtags pa gnyis kyis rgyal po las ji skad gsungs pa /
T02D1897:280b-34: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1897:280b-36: mchog gi bde ba dam par 'dod //
T02D1897:280b-37: rdzogs pa'i bsgom pa dman pa la /
T02D1897:281a-0: @281a * // bskyod pa dgos pa ci zhig yod //
T02D1897:281a-2: kye ma dad pa'i shugs kyis ni //
T02D1897:281a-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po nyams //
T02D1897:281a-4: lus kyi dngos med gang las bde //
T02D1897:281a-5: bde ba smra ba mi 'thad do //
T02D1897:281a-6: khyab bya khyab byed dngos po yis //
T02D1897:281a-7: bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid //
T02D1897:281a-8: ji ltar me tog la brten dri //
T02D1897:281a-9: me tog med pas rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1897:281a-10: de bzhin gzugs sogs med pas na //
T02D1897:281a-11: bde ba nyid ni dmigs mi 'gyur //
T02D1897:281a-13: de bzhin du rdo rje gur las kyang bstan te /
T02D1897:281a-14: ci bcom ldan 'das lus dang ldan pa sgom pa
T02D1897:281a-15: 'di la dgos pa ci zhig bdog bcom ldan 'das
T02D1897:281a-17: gsang ba'i bdag po dgos pa yod /
T02D1897:281a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa /
T02D1897:281a-21: sangs rgyas ji lta bu lags /
T02D1897:281a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1897:281a-23: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T02D1897:281a-24: phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba /
T02D1897:281a-25: lus dang bcas pa cig bcom ldan 'das lags sam /

T02D1897:281a-28: khyab bdag dpe byad brgyad cur ldan //

T02D1897:281a-30: rgyu yis ji ltar bsgrub byar 'gyur //

T02D1897:281a-34: nas 'di nyid du sgrub thabs kyang brjod do //
T02D1897:281a-35: lta ba las dman gyur pa rnams //
T02D1897:281a-36: bdag tu lta ba tshol 'dod la //
T02D1897:281a-37: bdag tu lta bas gsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1897:281a-38: rgyal bas stong pa nyid 'di bstan //
T02D1897:281a-40: thabs yin bde ba'i sgrub thabs so //
T02D1897:281a-41: sangs rgyas nga rgyal sbyor ba yis //
T02D1897:281a-42: sangs rgyas yun mi ring bar 'gyur //
T02D1897:281a-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1897:281a-44: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la sogs pa yang rgya ches pas 'jigs pas ma bris so //
T02D1897:281a-45: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor bla na
T02D1897:281a-46: med pa dang rnal 'byor ma lus pa bla na
T02D1897:281a-47: med pa'i rgyud kyi rab tu dbye ba dpal gsang
T02D1897:281b-0: ba 'dus @281b pa la thug pa rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1897:281b-1: theg pa mtha' dag tu longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i
T02D1897:281b-2: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyi gnas yin
T02D1897:281b-3: te / ji ltar bdag gis ji srid bri bar bya //
T02D1897:281b-4: ngag 'di dag ni drang ba'i don yang yin no //
T02D1897:281b-6: bde ba nyid gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa ste /
T02D1897:281b-7: 'khor lo yang rang rig pa'i tshad mas grub pa'i
T02D1897:281b-8: phyir 'dis ni lung gis gsal ba re zhig bsgrub
T02D1897:281b-9: bya yin no // 'di dag dgag par bya ba ma yin te /
T02D1897:281b-10: rang rig pa'i bde ba'i rnam pa bzhin du gzugs
T02D1897:281b-11: la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'khor lo la yang mi
T02D1897:281b-13: ci ste bde ba nyid sems kyi rang bzhin yul
T02D1897:281b-14: na mi gnas pas gnod par mi nus so zhe
T02D1897:281b-16: de ltar sdug bsngal la sogs pa yang de bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1897:281b-17: gzhan yang bde ba la sogs pa cha shas dang
T02D1897:281b-18: bcas pa yin zhen yan lag can gyi rdzas dang
T02D1897:281b-20: cha shas med na rdul phra rab bzhin no //
T02D1897:281b-21: de las gzhan pa'i rnam pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
T02D1897:281b-22: don med par brdzun du smra ba nyid do //
T02D1897:281b-23: gal te rang rig pas grub pas gnod pa med
T02D1897:281b-24: na 'di ltar rnam pa'i tshogs kyang rang rig pas
T02D1897:281b-25: grub pa'i phyir zhe sdang lhag pa nyid do //
T02D1897:281b-26: de bzhin du byed pa dang shes par byed pa
T02D1897:281b-27: yang bde ba la yin bzhin du rnam pa'i tshogs
T02D1897:281b-28: kyang de ma thag pa rang rig pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1897:281b-29: kyis rgyus rab tu grub pa nyid /
T02D1897:281b-30: 'dod pa yang bde ba chen po rgyas pa bla
T02D1897:281b-31: na med pa'i sku spangs te bde ba tsam nyid
T02D1897:281b-32: 'dod pa ni phyugs la yang mi srid do //
T02D1897:281b-34: 'khor lo'i skyon gyis ma gos shing //
T02D1897:281b-35: mtshan dang dpe byad dag 'bar ba //
T02D1897:281b-36: bdag gi dngos po spangs pa nyid //
T02D1897:281b-37: gal te 'dod na nam mkha' tsam //
T02D1897:281b-38: shes rab ye shes kyi dus na de tsam rab tu snang ba ni ma yin no //
T02D1897:281b-39: bde ba shar ba na yang dbyer med pa'i gzugs
T02D1897:281b-40: la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo la yang mi
T02D1897:281b-42: tshogs pa la sogs pa skye zhes pa'i rigs pas so //
T02D1897:281b-43: gzungs la sogs pa'i rnam pa snang ba la rab

T02D1897:282a-1: gzhan mi srid pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1897:282a-3: gang zhig 'bras bu skyed par byed rig na //

T02D1897:282a-5: de dang nye bas 'bras bu dang ldan ma yin na //
T02D1897:282a-6: cung zad gang las kyang ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1897:282a-7: skye bar byed pa ma tshang ba med de /
T02D1897:282a-8: de'i sngar gyi bde ba yang mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur bas so //
T02D1897:282a-10: thams cad nye bar dmigs pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1897:282a-11: gcig tu de'i gnas skabs na yang rnam pa sna
T02D1897:282a-12: tshogs pa'i sems dbyer med par gyur pa'i so so

T02D1897:282a-14: pa'i phyir dang / bla mas kyang de tsam blang
T02D1897:282a-15: bar bya ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir de dran
T02D1897:282a-16: pa srid pa na de nyid gsal zhes pa shes
T02D1897:282a-17: rab dman pa'i tha snyad do //

T02D1897:282a-20: byar 'gyur // nad mi bzad pa bsnun pa'i sdug
T02D1897:282a-21: bsngal yang de tsam rab tu snang ba'i phyir de

T02D1897:282a-25: rtsa ba med pa'i man ngag tsam ni bag med pa'i gnas so //
T02D1897:282a-26: sdug bsngal la sogs pa mi dmigs pa 'di rtag tu shar ba yang ma yin no //

T02D1897:282a-30: te bde ba ni yang rgyu tshogs pa khyad par
T02D1897:282a-31: can bsgom pa rab tu 'brel pa yin te /

T02D1897:282a-33: 'phags pa'i tshogs pa bsgom pa dang rab tu 'brel
T02D1897:282a-34: pa mthong ste / ji ltar 'dod ce na ma

T02D1897:282b-4: dbang po gnyis kho na las skyes pa ni bde ba ma yin te /

T02D1897:282b-30: kyi de'i bdag nyid kho na ste bsgrub bya zhes
T02D1897:282b-31: bya'o zhes so // na nyid de / so // gzhan yang chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ste /
T02D1897:282b-32: mi dmigs pa yang mi dmigs pa ni de kho na nyid de /
T02D1897:282b-33: de'i bdag nyid ni bsgrub bya zhes so //
T02D1897:282b-34: kha cig ni spyod pa thams cad las 'das pa
T02D1897:282b-35: so so rang gis rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D1897:282b-36: pa'i gnas skabs khyad par can ni de kho na
T02D1897:282b-37: nyid de / rtogs pa ni bsgrub bya zhes bya'o //
T02D1897:282b-38: yang kha cig na re rmi lam dang sgyu ma
T02D1897:282b-39: dang dri za'i grong khyer lta bu brdzun pa'i rnam
T02D1897:282b-40: par shes pa tsam ni de kho na nyid de
T02D1897:282b-41: / de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsgrub bya zhes 'dod do //
T02D1897:282b-42: de la dang po'i phyogs gnyis pa ni mi rigs
T02D1897:282b-43: te rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rab tu gsal ba
T02D1897:282b-44: tsam gyi tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1897:283a-0: skye ba med pa'i phyogs la yang lang kar gshegs par bcom @283a * //
T02D1897:283a-2: sems tsam nyid du rnam gzhag pa //
T02D1897:283a-3: skye ba med par ngas brjod do //
T02D1897:283a-5: de bzhin du mi dmigs pa dang bsam gyis mi
T02D1897:283a-6: khyab pa'i gnas skabs kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1897:283a-7: sems tsam nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1897:283a-8: brdzun pa nyid du smra ba yang rang rig pa'i mngon sum nyid kyi snod do //
T02D1897:283a-9: de lta bas na btags pa tsam gyis stong pa nyid ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D1897:283a-10: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1897:283a-11: lo bsgrub bya nyid do zhes rtogs par bya ste
T02D1897:283a-13: longs spyod rdzogs dang kha sbyar bde chen sna tshogs sems //
T02D1897:283a-14: snying rjes nges gang rgyun mi 'chad dang 'gog pa med //
T02D1897:283a-15: yan lag bdag 'dod 'dir ni bdun po nyid ldan pa //
T02D1897:283a-16: bsgrub byar tshad mas yongs bsgrubs blo yis bsngags //
T02D1897:283a-17: zhes te yan lag bdun dang ldan pa sngar brjod pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya blang bar bya'o //
T02D1897:283a-18: ji lta bu'i yang dkyil 'khor de dbyer med par
T02D1897:283a-19: gyur pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin blang bar
T02D1897:283a-20: bya ba ste / gang dang gang du yang de nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
T02D1897:283a-21: ji ltar yang longs spyod dang chos kyi sku'i don rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1897:283a-22: de bla na med pa'i bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis rtogs par bya'o ;
T02D1897:283a-23: / yang sgrub thabs ni dbang gis cho gar rtogs par byas pa'o //
T02D1897:283a-24: yon tan sum cu so drug gi rin po ches
T02D1897:283a-25: 'bras bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1897:283a-26: kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sems dpa' chen po'i byang
T02D1897:283a-27: chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi
T02D1897:283a-29: rang rig pa'i tshad mas rtogs pa dri ma med
T02D1897:283a-30: pa'i chos kyi dbyings gsal ba rigs ma lus pas
T02D1897:283a-31: brgyan pa nam mkha' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor pha
T02D1897:283a-32: rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa thams cad kyi don
T02D1897:283a-33: rnam par dag pa'i yan lag thams dang shes rab
T02D1897:283a-34: kyi rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1897:283a-35: las byung bar gyur pa'i rgya che ba'i bde bas
T02D1897:283a-37: rten dang brten pa'i bdag nyid dpal gsang ba 'dus
T02D1897:283a-38: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gang de'i bdag nyid
T02D1897:283a-39: spros pa dang bral ba rab tu gsal ba sbyangs
T02D1897:283a-40: pa ste / de brjod pa de lta bas na
T02D1897:283b-0: chos btags pa @283b de nyid kyis ngo bo nyid
T02D1897:283b-1: stong pa thams cad snang ba'i snod do //
T02D1897:283b-2: kha cig gis sna tshogs gnyis su med pa sems kyi 'khor lo 'di bsgom par bya ba ste /
T02D1897:283b-3: bsgom par bya bas spros pa zhi ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1897:283b-4: mngon sum byas na 'khor ba 'khor bar mi 'gyur ji srid 'di'i gnas skabs su //
T02D1897:283b-5: blang bya dor bya bsgrub byar 'byung ba yongs shes de srid du ni mi g-yo yod //
T02D1897:283b-6: de lta bas na tshogs gnyis goms pas yongs su
T02D1897:283b-7: gyur pa sku dang thugs kyi yon tan dag /
T02D1897:283b-8: rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'di ni dpe med pa yi
T02D1897:283b-9: gnas su byang chub thob ces grags //
T02D1897:283b-10: de la yang mchog gi phyag rgya gzung ba dag
T02D1897:283b-11: gis dga' bar rtsom pa'i dgod pa'i ro'i rol pa'i
T02D1897:283b-12: shugs stobs kyis gser gyi ska rags kyi mdud pa
T02D1897:283b-13: grol bar rang 'og gis rig ma'i mchog lang tsho
T02D1897:283b-14: bab pa mgrin pa dang bcas pa zhen pas gzung
T02D1897:283b-15: ba khyab pa'i mchog tu bde ba'i rtse mo'i rang
T02D1897:283b-16: bzhin ma lus pa gnyis su rtogs pa yongs su
T02D1897:283b-17: spangs pa rang rig pa la gzhol ba'i gnas skabs
T02D1897:283b-18: na yang nu ma mkhrang ba'i ba spu'i tshogs langs
T02D1897:283b-19: pa'i lus rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs
T02D1897:283b-20: pa'i rtse mor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1897:283b-21: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma yang 'jig rten gsum
T02D1897:283b-22: na spro pa chen po la gang zhig lhan cig
T02D1897:283b-23: skyes pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1897:283b-24: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang /
T02D1897:283b-26: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang /
T02D1897:283b-27: don dam pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1897:283b-30: thugs rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zab mo dang /
T02D1897:283b-36: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /
T02D1897:283b-44: zhi ba dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la
T02D1897:283b-45: sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis bsgrub bya gzhan khas len
T02D1897:283b-47: de la thams cad mkhyen pas kyang blo gros rtul
T02D1897:283b-48: po rnams rtogs par mdzad nus pa ma yin na
T02D1897:283b-49: ji ltar na kho bo cag rigs pa legs par
T02D1897:284a-0: @284a * // 'dar ba'i ral gri thogs pa rnams kyis kyang nus /
T02D1897:284a-1: cig tu dad pa la gzhol ba de kho na
T02D1897:284a-2: nyid ngan pa dang ldan pa'i tshig la yid ches
T02D1897:284a-3: pa tsam yin pa'i phyir snying brtse ba la mchog
T02D1897:284a-4: tu gzhol bas tshad ma dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1897:284a-5: rnams su gzhug par bya ba yin yang dam pa
T02D1897:284a-6: rjes su 'brang ba rnams la dam bcas ba tsam
T02D1897:284a-7: yin te spros pas kyang kho bo cag gi bla
T02D1897:284a-8: mas mdzad pa'i gsung rab kyi tshig gi sgril ma
T02D1897:284a-9: dpal ldan rnam pa bsdus par bshad pa yin no
T02D1897:284a-10: / dge ba 'di las sna tshogs kun //
T02D1897:284a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i bde 'byung gnas //
T02D1897:284a-12: mthar thug 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur //
T02D1897:284a-13: de rnams sdig kun bdag la smin //
T02D1897:284a-14: bdag ni 'jam pa'i smra ba'i rgyal po dang //
T02D1897:284a-15: 'jam gzhon rgyal ba'i khur khyer shog / gang gi nang na gsang 'dus dkyil 'khor yin pa la //
T02D1897:284a-16: kye ma sku yi cha byad gnas pa dge slong gzugs //
T02D1897:284a-17: sangs rgyas bstan pa bdag gis phung por byas //
T02D1897:284a-18: 'di ni bshes gnyen zhabs dpal las yin na //
T02D1897:284a-19: byis pa yin yang 'phral du don 'di 'gyur //
T02D1897:284a-20: bdag gi kha ni khab dang 'drar 'gyur kyang //
T02D1897:284a-21: 'di ni rnyan par dka' ba'i bdud rtsi yin //
T02D1897:284a-22: 'jig rten gsum gyis mgon po thob par shog /
T02D1897:284a-23: 'gro ba phun sum tshogs nyams skyob dang phan pa bgyid //
T02D1897:284a-24: brtul zhugs chen pos gnas pa thub pa'i rgyal po'i sras //
T02D1897:284a-25: zab dang rgya che'i tshul la rab tu zhugs pa gang yin par //
T02D1897:284a-26: 'di rnams ji ltar gyur pa'i cho ga rnam par phye ba yin //
T02D1897:284a-27: 'di ni bstan pa'i nor thams cad pa ste /
T02D1897:284a-28: pandi ta chen po ratna k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1897:284a-30: // / pandi ta ratna k'i rti dang /
